info.title: REST API for Ahrokhimpromtsentr
info.description: Simple REST API for managing dynamic content of services, vacancies and products on your website and staying in touch with your users.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: Endpoints for working with users. Roles required: admin.

tags.name: Vacancies
tags.description: Endpoints for working with vacancies. Roles required: admin or applyManager.

tags.name: Products
tags.description: Endpoints for working with products. Roles required: admin or productsManager.

tags.name: Services
tags.description: Endpoints for working with services. Roles required: admin or servicesManager.

tags.name: Feedbacks
tags.description: Endpoints for working with feedbacks. Roles required: admin.

tags.name: Resumes
tags.description: Endpoints for working with resumes. Roles required: admin or applyManager.

200.description: Successful login. Returns a cookie named jwt.You need to include this cookie in refresh requests

200.description: Successful refresh user.Returns a cookie named jwt.You need to include this cookie in refresh requests

Set-Cookie.description: Returns a cookie named jwt.You need to include this cookie in refresh requests

200.description: Successful sent new password via email

401.description: Not authorized / A wrong password was entered

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort via newest first or oldest first

schema.description: The DESC keyword is used to sort the query result set in descending order. The ASC keyword is used to sort the query result set in ascending order.

title.description: Vacancy title must contain only letters, numbers, hyphens and apostrophes

sallary.description: Vacancy sallary must contain oly numbers and '-' between numbers

contactMail.description: Your email should be a valid blend of Latin letters, numbers, and signs, devoid of hyphens at the beginning or end, with a minimum of two characters preceding the (@) symbol.

contactPhone.description: Contact phone must contain only +380 and 9 numbers after Ukraine country code

workExperienceRequired.description: Work experience must contain only numbers and '-' between numbers. No spaces are allowed.

location.description: Vacancy location must contain only letters without spaces
